author: Rick Spilman
content: Thanks for the clarification. I also agree. The people at Discovery Channel/Canada are top notch. They were committed to getting the stories right and telling then well. Very impressive.

author: Robert Ford
content: Just to clarify, I was not an investigator for this accident. I was an investigator for the NTSB from 2001 to 2006. I provided background information and knowledge as to how investigations are, or should be, conducted. I was a sea-going mariner when the Marine Electric sank. Discovery Channel/Canada, which has produced this series, contacted me to discuss another accident. I was the investigator for a Liberian flagged vessel that sank (Ice-ship/Explorer) in Antarctica. I would like to add, the people at Discovery Channel/Canada should be applauded for this. They were professionals at every level and, hopefully, this exposure will shed some light which will save lives.
